item.title: Create and hosting an interactive app with Jupyter, Voilà and Heroku
item.description: In this article, I will demonstrate how easy it is to create an interactive web app using Jupyter Notebooks, Voilà and Heroku. We will use Jupyter to create a simple notebook that plots a graph based on user input, turn this into an interactive dashboard using Voilà, and host it online using Heroku. Before we get started, there are a few prerequisites: I am presuming that you already have Jupyter installed and are familiar with using it and Python in general.
